# GEE Portfolio

A portfolio of Google Earth Engine projects from the Code Editor. Each project includes code, study area, datasets, and exported results.

## Gallery

<!-- BEGIN:GALLERY -->
*Gallery blocks are generated by `tools/make_gallery.py` from `projects/*/results/maps/*.png`. Run the script to populate this section.*
<!-- END:GALLERY -->
